00028 class pluginBase : public config_plugin_base
00029 {
00030         Q_OBJECT
00031 
00032 public: 
00033         pluginBase( const QString & path, const QString & inkey, const QString &inuserLevel );
00034         virtual ~pluginBase();  
00035 
00036         friend class configFile;
00037         
00038         // My interface ( subclass (and other)'s access to me )
00039         configFile &file( QString s );  
00040         bool waitForAllFiles();
00041         void addMenu(QPopupMenu *p);
00042         void addToolbar(QDockWindow *d);
00043         void doSaveFile( configFile &f );
00044         void doLoadFile( configFile &f );
00045         
00046 signals:
00047         void command( QString, QString );
00048         
00049 protected:
00050         // My interface ( client callbacks )
00053         virtual void init() {}  
00054 
00058         virtual void deinit( QCloseEvent *ce ) { ce->accept(); }
00059         
00065         virtual void saveFile( QString sFile ) {}
00066 
00069         virtual void loadFile( QString sFile ) {}
00070 
00071 private:
00072         // My parents interface ( that which I am implementing )
00073         virtual void reply( response * r );                     // Responses come in here
00074         virtual bool isDirty();                                         // The editor wants to know if I'm dirty! 
00075         virtual void apply();                                           // Time to save some files.
00076         virtual void activate( bool me );                       // We're on / off
00077         virtual void closeEvent( QCloseEvent *ce );     // Close for good ( time to upload )
00078         virtual QDockWindowList toolbars( void );       // Give the editor a list of toolbars
00079         virtual QPopupMenuList menus( void );           // Give the editor a list of menus
00080 
00081         // My interface ( file's access to server )
00082         void sendCommand( QString sCommand, QString sFilename );
00083 
00084         // Internal helpers
00085         void saveAllFiles();
00086         void loadModdedFiles();
00087         void uploadAllFiles();
00088         void releaseAllLocks();
00089 
00090         typedef QMap<QString, configFile> fileMapT;
00091         fileMapT fileMap;
00092         bool bInited;                   // Has the plugin been initialised yet?
00093 
00094         QDockWindowList toolbarList;
00095         QPopupMenuList menuList;
00096 
00097 };
